task.title: Add or Change User Roles and Qualifiers
task.shortdesc: Add or change a user role and its qualifiers on the Add/Change User Role page.

context.p: The Add/Change User Role page is accessed from the User Roles page. The functionality of the Add/Change User Role page varies. The Add icon is used to add a new role and select qualifiers. When selecting a role assigned to a user, the page's functionality is to modify or add qualifiers to the selected role.

step.cmd: Search for a user by using the Find By field. Search results appear.
Select the link in the Full Name column. The User Security > User Summary page appears.
From the User Roles page, complete one of the following:

ul.li: To add a role, select Add.
To change a role's qualifier, select the Role link.

step.cmd: From the Add/Change User Role page, select a role from the Role drop-down list. Additional fields appear.

image.alt: Add and Change User Role Page

step.cmd: Check the Exclude User From Viewing Self box to restrict the user from accessing or changing his/her employee record. In addition, checking this box along with the Use This Role in UltiPro Business Intelligence Reporting box excludes the user from appearing in any Business Intelligence reports that he/she generates.
OPTIONAL: Check the Use This Role in UltiPro Business Intelligence Reporting box if this role should be configured with user qualifiers for use in Business Intelligence reports.

note.p: If you select this option for multiple roles, Business Intelligence aggregates these roles and their respective qualifiers; therefore, reporting results are based on the conjunction of the qualifiers across all selected roles. For ease of use and manageability of roles impacting Business Intelligence, use only one role for Business Intelligence access and assign this role to desired users. Upon assigning the role, select the Use This Role in UltiPro Business Intelligence Reporting option with the desired qualifiers to ensure accurate reporting and expected results.

step.cmd: OPTIONAL: Check the Only Show Qualifiers That Have Selections box to display only qualifiers with selections. This can reduce scrolling on a page when the role being changed has numerous possible qualifiers.

note.p: When adding a new role, qualifier values from applicable Qualifier sections have not been selected; scroll to ensure you have reviewed all available qualifiers when initially configuring the qualifiers for the new role. Once the qualifier values are selected, checking the Only Show Qualifiers That Have Selections box reduces scrolling on a page where the role has numerous possible qualifiers but only a limited number of qualifiers have selected qualifier values.

step.cmd: In the applicable Qualifier section, complete one of the following:

ul.li: Select the right double arrows to move all the qualifiers from the Available box to the Selected box.
Select a qualifier from the Available box, and select the right arrow to move one selection to the Selected box.

note.p: Based on the role selected, different qualifier sections appear. For example, for a user assigned to both the Department Manager and the System Administrator roles, selecting the Department Manager role may only display the Company qualifier section; selecting the System Administrator role may only display the qualifier sections for organization levels, such as Department, Establishment or other valid qualifier sections such as Job Codes.

step.cmd: Select Save. The User Roles page appears.
